projects.title: The Network
projects.description: A comprehensive social media platform built with the MERN+G stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, GraphQL). Features include user authentication, real-time posts, friend connections, and a responsive UI. Demonstrates full-stack development skills with modern technologies including JWT authentication, GraphQL API design, and React with Semantic-UI.

projects.title: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.description: A real-time COVID-19 data visualization dashboard built with React. Integrates with public APIs to display global statistics, trends, and regional data through interactive charts. Features responsive design, data filtering, and clean UI using styled-components. Demonstrates API integration, data visualization, and modern React development practices.
